project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement logic to get the top 10 most common words
Display the results in the terminal
Write tests for the file reading, word counting, and display functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
